entries.title: Rapper Theophilus London found 'safe' after being reported missing: Police
entries.description: Rapper Theophilus London, who was reported missing last week in Los Angeles, has been “located in good condition” and was reunited with his family, the LAPD announced.

entries.title: Survey: 3.3 million US adults displaced by natural disasters
entries.description: More than 1.3% of the adult population in the U.S. was displaced by natural disasters in the past year, with hurricanes responsible for more than half of the forced relocations

entries.title: Texas fires Chris Beard amid felony domestic violence charge
entries.description: Texas has fired basketball coach Chris Beard, who faces a felony domestic family violence charge after his fiancée told police he strangled and bit her

entries.title: Ovidio Guzman, son of El Chapo and alleged drug trafficker, arrested in Mexico
entries.description: Ovidio Guzmán, a top leader of the Sinaloa Cartel and the son of Joaquin "El Chapo" Guzmán, the notorious drug lord, has been arrested by authorities in Mexico.

entries.title: OSHA: American retaliated against workers who reported fumes
entries.description: Federal officials say American Airlines retaliated against flight attendants who complained about jet fuel fumes seeping into airplane cabins

entries.title: State legislator killed in wrong-way car crash: 'Shocking and unfathomable'
entries.description: Connecticut state Rep. Quentin Williams was killed in a car crash, hours after he was sworn in for his third term on Wednesday, state officials said.

entries.title: FBI informant risked life to stop a terrorist attack
entries.description: A new ABC News podcast series takes a look at how Dan Day infiltrated a right-wing militia and helped the FBI foil a planned terrorist attack.

entries.title: Study: Two-thirds of glaciers on track to disappear by 2100
entries.description: A new study calculates that two-thirds of the world's glaciers will disappear by the end of the century at current climate change trends

entries.title: Peloton agrees to pay $19 million fine over treadmill recall: CPSC
entries.description: Peloton has agreed to pay a $19 million fine as part of a settlement over its 2021 treadmill recall, the U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission announced Thursday.

entries.title: Former CEO of crypto firm Celsius sued in New York over alleged fraud
entries.description: The lawsuit alleges that the former crypto executive defrauded hundreds of thousands of investors while leading Celsius.

entries.title: Ex-MMA fighter charged in death of girlfriend in Mexico
entries.description: Former mixed martial arts fighter Phil Baroni was being held in a Mexican jail Thursday after he was arrested on suspicion of killing his girlfriend, authorities said.

entries.title: Man arrested after alleged threat of mass shooting against LGBTQ people
entries.description: A Florida man has been arrested by FBI in connection with a mass shooting threat against LGBTQ people at Florida State University.

entries.title: Bakers in France face dilemma: Close their business or raise baguette prices
entries.description: The cherished French baguette is in trouble.

entries.title: Uber drivers strike in New York City after pay increase temporarily blocked
entries.description: A lawsuit from Uber temporarily blocked a pay increase last month.

entries.title: New York seized record amount of fentanyl in 2022: DEA
entries.description: New York seized 1.9 million fentanyl-laced, fake prescription pills in 2022.

entries.title: Biden to make first trip to US-Mexico border as president on Sunday
entries.description: President Joe Biden plans to visit the southern border with Mexico on Sunday, for the first time since taking office, according to an administration official.

entries.title: $940M Mega Millions prize just latest of massive jackpots
entries.description: Call it the Golden Age of lottery jackpots

entries.title: Fewer Americans file for jobless claims last week
entries.description: Fewer Americans applied for jobless benefits last week, reflecting a still-robust job market despite the Federal Reserve’s efforts to cool the economy and bring down decades-high inflation

entries.title: Mercedes recalls nearly 324K vehicles due to engine stalling
entries.description: Mercedes is recalling nearly 324,000 vehicles in the U.S. because the engines can stall while they’re being driven

entries.title: WATCH:  6-year-old goes viral for playing over 8 instruments
entries.description: Miles Bonham's musical skills have captured the attention of artists like Lenny Kravitz, Questlove and Charlie Puth.

entries.title: Man charged in Takeoff's death released on $1 million bond
entries.description: The man charged with murder in the fatal shooting of Migos rapper Takeoff in Houston has been released on $1 million bond

entries.title: 2-year-old boy killed when redwood tree falls on double-wide trailer
entries.description: A 2 and a half-year-old boy has died after a redwood tree fell on a double-wide mobile home on Wednesday evening in California as a massive storm pummeled the state.

entries.title: Ohio man, jailed for fake Facebook page, asks SCOTUS to let him sue police
entries.description: An Ohio man, jailed in 2016 over a parody of his local police department on Facebook, is asking the Supreme Court to allow him to sue the cops for violating civil rights.

entries.title: Report: Prince Harry says William attacked him during row
entries.description: Prince Harry alleges that his brother Prince William physically attacked him.

entries.title: Family of 8, including 5 children, found dead in Utah home with gunshot wounds
entries.description: A family of eight people, including five children, were found dead with apparent gunshot wounds in a Utah home on Wednesday in Enoch City, Utah.

entries.title: Vatican readies Benedict mass 'roughly similar' to past popes' funerals
entries.description: A funeral mass for Pope Emeritus Benedict XVI is scheduled to begin 9:30 a.m. on Thursday at the Vatican.

entries.title: 8 found fatally shot in Utah home, including 5 children
entries.description: Eight people including five children were found dead from gunshot wounds Wednesday in a southern Utah home

entries.title: Russia's hypersonic missile-armed ship to patrol global seas
entries.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin has sent a frigate armed with the country’s latest hypersonic weapons on a trans-ocean cruise in a show of force as tensions with the West escalate over the war in Ukraine

entries.title: Amazon, Salesforce jettison jobs in latest tech worker purge
entries.description: E-commerce giant Amazon and business software maker Salesforce are the latest U.S. tech companies to announce major job cuts

entries.title: Man accused of chewing off man's ear said victim was a robot
entries.description: Police say a man accused of chewing off the ear of a 78-year-old man on a light-rail train platform near Portland, Oregon, told detectives he thought the victim was a robot trying to kill him

entries.title: Ex-UFC fighter Phil Baroni charged with murder in Mexico
entries.description: Former mixed martial arts fighter Phil Baroni has been arrested in Mexico for allegedly killing his girlfriend

entries.title: Supply chain woes caused US auto sales to fall 8% last year
entries.description: Shortages of computer chips and other parts continued to hobble the U.S. auto industry last year

entries.title: Domestic extremism at southern border could rise amid possible end of Title 42: DHS
entries.description: Violence targeting migrants along the border could rise amid the possible lifting of the restriction known as Title 42, according to the Department of Homeland Security

entries.title: First lady Jill Biden to have small lesion found during skin cancer screening removed
entries.description: First lady Jill Biden will undergo a dermatological procedure next week to remove a small lesion above her right eye, White House officials said.

entries.title: $9.1 million in cocaine seized from Puerto Rico ferry, border officials say
entries.description: U.S. customs officers seized 877 pounds of cocaine concealed on board a Carribean ferry boat

entries.title: South Florida migrant encounters up 400%: Border Patrol
entries.description: U.S. officials in South Florida have seen a 400% increase in migrant encounters this fiscal year compared to the same period last year.
